date: The transaction date in YYYY-MM-DD format.
region: Geographical region where the sale occurred (e.g., North, South, East, West).
product: The product name or category sold (e.g., Laptop, Mouse, Keyboard, Monitor, Tablet).
sales_amount: Total monetary value of the sales transaction, expressed in the local currency.
units_sold: Number of product units sold in the transaction.
customer_type: Type of customer making the purchase (e.g., Corporate, Individual).
